name: tramway
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
mainly UK a system of transport using trams (= electric vehicles that go along metal tracks in the road): Many cities and towns are introducing or reintroducing tramways of ultra modern design.
UK the metal tracks that trams or other vehicles run along: The whole area is interwoven with narrow gauge tramways for transporting the sugar harvest to the crushing plant.
US (also aerial tramway) a vehicle that hangs from and is moved by a cable (= a thick, strong wire) and transports people or goods up steep slopes or above an area of land: Roosevelt Island Tramway: Hitch a ride over the East River to Roosevelt Island and back on one of the City's more novel and fun forms of transit. You can enjoy a bird's-eye view of the zoo from the Skyfari aerial tramway, or take a guided tour bus. In the 1880s local limestone was carried on a complex aerial tramway to be loaded onto ships at Rockland Landing. Synonym
cable car
